Description: Pottery sherd, probably from a cup. Dark slip inside and out with traces of white and red paint on outside. Spiral pattern apparent on outside.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (A557)
Kemp & Merrillees 1980 / Minoan Pottery in Second Millennium Egypt (Ka.15) (p. 65-6)
